title: Bus Route
description: A bus route with its stops in the Davao City High Priority Bus (HPB) system

id.description: UUID7 identifier for the route. NEVER modify this after creation.

name.description: Human-readable route name (e.g., 'Toril to GE Torres')

area.description: Geographic area the route originates from

stops.description: Bus stops in sequence order (first stop = origin, last = destination)

id.description: UUID7 identifier for the stop. NEVER modify this after creation.

name.description: Stop name as displayed on signage

latitude.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (Davao City range: 6.9-7.2)

longitude.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (Davao City range: 125.4-125.7)
